children.name: tab_label
children.label: Label
children.help_text: The label that appears for each tab section.

children.name: content
children.label: Content
children.help_text: The hidden content for the tab (can include text, headers, images, etc).

children.name: anchor_link_prefix
children.label: Anchor Link Prefix
children.help_text: Set a unique prefix, allowing you to link to specific tabs in the module from other pages. E.g. if your prefix was "methodology," you could link people to https://www.hubspot.com/your-page-url#methodology2 â€” this will scroll directly to this module with Tab 2 open.

children.name: background_theme
children.label: Background Theme
children.help_text: The background color theme for the module container.

children.name: mobile_sizing
children.label: Mobile Sizing
children.help_text: This module converts to an accordion view on mobile. This field determines the size of each accordion item.
